short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step away from the hustle and experience a moment of tranquility with Intermission. A better new tab experience for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KEEP IT SIMPLY SILLY!
Introducing a sleek and straightforward new tab/homepage experience for the Chrome browser, made for simplicity lovers. It's designed to show you the essentials right off the bat: A lively fresh background image every time you open a new tab, the date and time, weather updates for your city, and direct links to your everyday digital journeys. For a dash of fun and motivation, there's also a 'quirky advice'/'driving quotes' section!
